author: Loren Grush
title: Iran claims it has successfully launched a military satellite
description: Iran claims to have launched its first military satellite into orbit on April 22nd, marking the first successful space launch for the country in years after it repeatedly failed attempts to put a vehicle into space.
content:
The first successful launch after a string of failures
Image: Screengrab from video by Islamic Republic of Iran Broadcasting
Iran claims to have launched its first military satellite into orbit on Wednesday, according to The Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corp… [+2553 chars]
